log module¶

class log.Log(output_file, log_routing_change=True, log_rib_change=True, log_packets=False, log_paths=False, log_states=False)[source]¶

Bases: object

Defines data logging utilities

__init__(output_file, log_routing_change=True, log_rib_change=True, log_packets=False, log_paths=False, log_states=False)[source]¶

Constructor. :param output_file: output file name. will be overwritten if already existing :param log_routing_change: enable/disable logging of routing changes :param log_packets: enable/disable logging of packets :param log_paths: enable/disable logging of new paths :param log_states: enable/disable logging of the state of nodes

log_packet_rx(node, event)[source]¶

Logs a packet rx. :param node: source node :param packet: the packet to log

log_packet_tx(node, event)[source]¶

Logs a packet tx. :param node: source node :param packet: the packet to log

log_path(node_id, event)[source]¶

Logs a new path to a dst. :param node_id: source node :param path: the path to log

log_rib_change(node_id, event)[source]¶

Logs the rib state change It means that the knowledge of routes is changed in some way :param node_id: id of the node that changed :param state: the new state of the rib

log_rt_change(node, event)[source]¶

Logs the result of a routing table change :param node: The node that triggered the event :param route: the new route in the routing table

log_state(node)[source]¶

Logs the state of a particular node :param node: node :param state: state of the node
